whyMe.title: Why me
whyMe.text: Ever since I was a kid, I’ve been drawn to computers and technology. I enjoy figuring things out, solving problems, and building ideas that make life a little simpler. I like to think outside the box, and I truly believe that every problem has more than one solution — it’s just about finding the best one.

mySkills.title: My Skills
mySkills.challengeMe: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need!

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

sharkie.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.

testimonials.headline: Need a teamplayer? Here’s what my colleagues said about me

dora.name: Dora Telekesi
dora.text: ’’Working with Noah was great – reliable, creative, and always full of good ideas. He not only pushed our project forward technically but also made teamwork really enjoyable.’’

contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: I love transforming ideas into real results and I’m always eager to take on new challenges. If you’re looking for someone who brings energy, focus, and reliable value to your projects, let’s connect.
contact.name: Your Name

privacy.part3: and I agree to the processing of my data.

errors.nameMin: Name must be at least {{min}} characters.
errors.messageMin: Message must be at least {{min}} characters.

IMPRINT.TITLE: Imprint
IMPRINT.NAME: Noah Velickovic
IMPRINT.DISCLAIMER_TEXT: The contents of this website have been created with the greatest care. However, I cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of the content.
IMPRINT.LINKS_TEXT: This website contains links to external third-party websites, the content of which I have no influence over. Therefore, I cannot accept any responsibility for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for the content.
IMPRINT.COPYRIGHT_TEXT: The content and works created by the site operator on this website are subject to Austrian copyright law. Contributions by third parties are marked as such. The duplication, editing, distribution and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.GENERAL_TEXT: Protecting your personal data is very important to me. Therefore, your data is processed exclusively on the basis of the legal provisions (GDPR, TKG 2003).
PRIVACY.DATA_COLLECTION_TEXT: No personal data is stored automatically. If you contact me by e-mail, the data you provide will be stored for the purpose of processing the request. This data will not be shared without your consent.
PRIVACY.COOKIES_TEXT: This website does not use cookies that collect personal data. Technically necessary cookies are only used to ensure the functionality of the site.
PRIVACY.THIRD_PARTY_TEXT: If external content (e.g. Google Fonts, embedded videos) is used, it is subject to the privacy policies of the respective providers.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction, data portability, withdrawal and objection. If you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection law, you may lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority.
